channel.title: Enxiun 667|Curses|Customs|25 Skills|
channel.description:
Enxiun is unlike any other server. We offer all working skills, custom bosses, high scores and so much! We have a friendly staff and player community. [b]Bosses:[/b] - Bandos, Zamorak, Armadyl, Saradomin - Nex - Corporeal Beast - Wildy Wyrm - Vorago -Avatar of Destruction - Kal'ger - Shadow Strykewyrms - Bork - Kalphite Queen - Dagonoth Kings - Revenants - Lucien
[b]Fun Areas/Minigames:[/b] - Duel Area - Clan Wars - Safe Pvp (Home) - Barrows
http://www.enxiun.com

item.title: Enxiun 667|Curses|Customs|25 Skills|
item.dc:creator: @hxze hxze
item.description:
@hxze wrote:

70% of the pictures are donation pictures. what about some pictures of the unique things that would want me to play showing me whats in your donation shops is not attractive.
[/quote]

Theres 5 images
70% of them would be 3.5 images, 2 of them are about Donator features (the donator shop, and super donator boss)

The “loyalty shop” is for loyalty points which all players can access

Read full topic

item.title: Enxiun 667|Curses|Customs|25 Skills|
item.dc:creator: @Ix_Soulcist_xI Soulcist
item.description:
@Ix_Soulcist_xI wrote:

I like the homepage and nice forum theme but when I first opened up that forum, it KILLED me. That is way too bright! Should perhaps find an alternative dark theme for other members as well, holy Hell.

Anyway, find more media to add as obviously you’re not getting too many positive comments so far.

Read full topic
